content: this is my gift to the crochet community for all of the support and encouragement i have received in my first year of crochet design thank you **<big><big>hook sizes </big></big>** this pattern was designed using rhss yarn and a k hook the hook size that is recommended on a yarn ball band is going to be too small for this design **you must use a large hook for your yarn weight** or your project will not lay flat and it will have very severe puckering trying to use the smallest hook size possible is the wrong way to go with this design it will not lay flat stitches & abbreviations used space chain slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet ehdc double_crochet edc treble_crochet etr dtr edtr single_crochet increase half_double_crochet increase double_crochet increase treble_crochet increase decrease sc3tog decrease dc3tog dc4tog tr2tog tr3tog tr4tog tr5tog beg-cluster cluster cluster-v fpdc fptr hook size k/6 5mm yarn weight worsted/medium/aran/4 yarn used red heart super saver total yardage 4 004 yards/3 661 meters this is written for a 5 color gradient from darkest color to lightest color colors 1 royal 2 skeins = 728 yards/665 meters 2 blue 2 skeins = 728 yards/665 meters 3 delft blue 2 skeins = 728 yards/665 meters 4 light blue 2 skeins = 728 yards/665 meters 5 white 3 skeins = 1 092 yards/998 meters correction for round 28 join in 1st **ehdc** to the right of any dc3tog changed double_crochet to ehdc 12-12-15 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/made-of-change
